poem:
Title: A Resilient Solitude

In the shadow-clad plaza, Pedro unfolds,
Declared in ink by morning's paper bold.
Quiet as the ripening olive groves,
He braves harsh gales of influence and woes,
Choosing not to surrender his roost, nor hand,
Yet standing, firm as the Sagrada's sand.
A dance with power, a relentless song -
The leader, in his place, resolute and strong.
